Freq: 5753
廛，读作chán，本意是古代城市平民的房地，古同“缠”，束。
廛, pronounced chán, originally meant to be the premises of common people in ancient cities. In ancient times, it was "wrapped" and bundled.

廛字的基本解释

廛
chán
古代城市平民的房地：廛里（古代城市中住宅的通称）。市廛（集市）。
古同“缠”，束。

廛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》直連切，平仙，澄。］
亦作“1”。亦作“1”。亦作“厘2”。
(1)古代平民一家在城邑中所占的房地。后泛指民居、市宅。
(2)特指公家所建供商人存储货物的邸舍。《礼记·王制》：“市，廛而不税。”郑玄注：“廛，市物邸舍。税其舍不税其物。”《孟子·公孙丑上》：“市，廛而不征，法而不廛，則天下之商皆悦，而願藏於其市矣。”此谓货物储藏于邸舍。一说廛是市内可以储存货物的空地。见《周礼·地官·廛人》“凡珍異之有滯者”郑玄注引郑司农说。
(3)通“纏”。束。

廛字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廛； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页350第22
【唐韻】直連切【集韻】【韻會】澄延切【正韻】呈延切，?音纏。【說文】一畝半，一家之居。【詩·魏風】胡取禾三百廛兮。【傳】一夫之居曰廛。【周禮·地官·遂人】夫一廛田百畮。【註】廛，城邑之居。【揚子·方言】東齊海岱之閒謂居曰廛。　又【玉篇】市邸也。【禮·王制】市廛而不稅。【註】廛市物邸舍，稅其舍，不稅其物。【周禮·地官·廛人】掌斂廛布，而入于泉府。【註】廛布者，貨賄諸物邸舍之稅【疏】謂在行肆，官有邸舍，人有置物於中，使之出稅，故云廛布也。【班固·西都賦】闐城溢郭，旁流百廛。　又【集韻】或作㙻。【前漢·揚雄傳】有田一㙻。　又【集韻】亦作㙻㢆鄽。

廛
Basic explanation of words
廛
chán
The premises of the common people in ancient cities: Xiaoli (a general term for dwellings in ancient cities). Market (bazaar).
The ancient same "wrapped" and bundled.
廛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" is cut straight, flat and clear. ]
Also known as "1". Also called "1". Also known as "Li 2".
(1) The premises occupied by the families of common people in ancient times. Later refers to residential and city houses.
(2) Specifically refers to the residences built by public houses for merchants to store goods. "Book of Rites · King System": "City, not tax." Zheng Xuan's note: "Treasure, city property residences. Taxation of houses does not tax other things." "Mencius·Gongsun Chou Shang": "City, not taxation Expropriation, law without restriction, all businessmen in the world are happy, and they are willing to hide in their cities." This means that goods are stored in residences. Firstly, it is an open space in the city where goods can be stored. See "Zhou Li·Diguan·Hanren", "Everything Rare and Stuck" Zheng Xuan's commentary quoted Zheng Sinong.
(3) Through "wrapped". bundle.
廛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廛; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 350 22
[Tang Yun] Cut straight through [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cheng Yan cut [Zheng Yun] The cut is extended, and the sound is tangled. [Said the text] One and a half acres, a family home. 【Poetry·Wei Feng】Hu Quhe three hundred years ago. [Biography] The residence of a husband is called 廛. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Suiren】The husband has one hundred pans and one hundred pans. [Note] 廛, the residence of the city. 【Yangtze Dialect】The leisure of Haidai in the Eastern Qi Dynasty is called Juyuexiang.　[Jade articles] City residence also. 【Rite·Royal】The city is not taxable. [Note] Xingshi real estate houses are taxed for their houses, but not for their belongings. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Xinren】The palms grabbed the cloth and entered Yuquan Mansion. [Note] Those who buy cloth, bribe the taxes of all things and houses [Sparse] It means that in the business, the official has the house, and the person has the property in the middle, so that it is taxed, so the cloud is also cloth. 【Bangu·Xidu Fu】Tiancheng overflows with Guo, with hundreds of rivers beside it.　 [Ji Yun] or Zuo 㙻. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Arita Kazuo.　 [Ji Yun] also made 㙻㢆鄽.

3) вм. 缠 (мотать; обматывать)
